build.C

In this example, we model the 3-D distribution of jet data using some of the data in the file jetdata.dat. After setting up Root, the creation of the KDE is done with the command 

        root -l build.C

If successful, this should:

  1. run Minuit to find better choices for the 3 bandwidths
  2. create the figures
    • fig_pt.gif
    • fig_eta.gif
    • fig_phi.gif
  3. create the self-contained c++ source file
    • jetdata.cpp
